title: ONE PIECE 3D 激走!トラップコースター

search.original_title: ONE PIECE 3D 激走! トラップコースター
search.overview: Luffy continues his voyage with the Straw Hat Pirates in hopes of becoming the Pirate King. That is until he crosses paths with one of the Marine’s most intelligent captains, Captain Trap. Determined to capture Luffy, the captain attacks the Thousand Sunny with various traps he created. His intention is to make Luffy his right hand man.
search.title: One Piece 3D: Gekisou! Trap Coaster

search.overview: 唯、澪、律、䌷四人即将高中毕业，决定进行一次毕业旅行。梓听到信息，也决定跟随学姐们一起旅行。她们各自提出自己想要去的目的地，最终通过抽签选中去伦敦的计划。几位女生在为毕业旅行做准备的同时，关于伦敦的想象也在飞驰……
search.title: 轻音少女 剧场版

title: メジャー ワールドシリーズ編

search.name: Major: World Series
search.original_name: メジャー ワールドシリーズ編
search.overview: According to Weekly Shonen Sunday, a new OVA of manga "Major" was announced to be released in December. The World Series chapter, which was skipped in the TV series, will be animated. This OVA will be the final anime of Major.

title: 武装中学生 バスケットアーミー

search.name: Basket Army
search.original_name: 武装中学生 バスケットアーミー
search.overview: The story is set in August of 2026 at the Fuji Training Facility. Natori Touko, a third-year middle school student in the Eastern Private Defense Academy, is entrenched in field training with instructor Kamiya. It has been a harsh training regiment, but it is finally the last day. Kamiya proposes a extracurricular class under the name Newest Weapons Research. But then, an incident occurs that rocks all of Japan.

title: 劇場版イナズマイレブンGO 究極の絆 グリフォン

search.original_title: 劇場版イナズマイレブンGO 究極の絆 グリフォン
search.overview: 主角松风天马及雷门足球社的伙伴们， 参加了“神圣之道”的竞赛，在进行决定中学足球第一名赛事的同时， 暗中也进行着决定下一届圣帝的大会，但无视于胜败命令的雷门足球社， 用尽全力的在进行比赛。而在本次的电影作品中， 雷门足球社收到了必需参加强化合宿的命令……。
search.title: 闪电十一人GO 究极之绊 狮鹫兽
